title: Calling all GSE Deep Specialists – Opportunity to join the Learning and Development Forum

content.text: Are you in a role that requires a high level of science or engineering training in a specific  area? Do you use this deep specialist knowledge and experience daily?

If so, then we need your skills and experience as we develop a package of learning and development offers for our GSE Deep Specialists. We require your views on what Deep Specialists need to develop their careers.
Email gse@go-science.gov.uk to join other members in a Deep Specialist Learning and Development forum starting in November 2023.
Deep Specialist Learning and Development opportunities

We know some Deep Specialists wish to develop their technical skills, and some wish to develop leadership skills outside of their specialism, or perhaps a mixture of both. Whilst we develop the L&D package, we’ll be tagging relevant blogs as ‘deep specialist’ so you can easily find existing relevant learning and development opportunities.
